verses.verse: You are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: you shall not cut <S%H1413><s%> yourselves <S%H7760><s%>, nor make any baldness <S%H7144><s%> between your eyes <S%H5869><s%> for the dead <S%H4191><s%>.

For you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> you to be a peculiar <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself <S%H5971><s%>, above all the nations that are upon <S%H6440><s%> the earth <S%H127><s%>.
You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> any abominable thing <S%H8441><s%>.
These are the animals <S%H929><s%> which you shall eat <S%H398><s%>: the ox <S%H7794><s%>, the sheep <S%H7716><s%>, and the goat <S%H5795><s%>,

The hart <S%H354><s%>, and the roebuck <S%H6643><s%>, and the red deer <S%H3180><s%>, and the wild goat <S%H689><s%>, and the pygarg <S%H1788><s%>, and the wild ox <S%H8377><s%>, and the chamois <S%H2169><s%>.

And every animal <S%H929><s%> that parts <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and cleaves <S%H8157><s%> the hoof <S%H8156><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> claws <S%H6541><s%>, and chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> among the animals <S%H929><s%>, that you shall eat <S%H398><s%>.

Nevertheless these you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, or of them that divide <S%H6536><s%> the cloven <S%H8156><s%> hoof <S%H6541><s%>; as the camel <S%H1581><s%>, and the hare <S%H768><s%>, and the coney <S%H8227><s%>: for they chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, but divide <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>; therefore they are unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.

And the pigs <S%H2386><s%>, because it divides <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, yet chews not the cud <S%H1625><s%>, it is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you <S%H398><s%>: you shall not eat of their flesh <S%H1320><s%>, nor touch <S%H5060><s%> their dead carcass <S%H5038><s%>.
These you shall eat <S%H398><s%> of all that are in the waters <S%H4325><s%>: all that have fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%>:
And whatever has not fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> you may not eat <S%H398><s%>; it is unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.
Of all clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%>.
But these are they of which you shall not eat <S%H398><s%>: the eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and the ossifrage <S%H6538><s%>, and the ospray <S%H5822><s%>,
And the glede <S%H7201><s%>, and the kite <S%H344><s%>, and the vulture <S%H1772><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>,
And every raven <S%H6158><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>,
And the owl <S%H1323><s%>, and the night hawk <S%H8464><s%>, and the cuckow <S%H7828><s%>, and the hawk <S%H5322><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>,
The little owl <S%H3563><s%>, and the great owl <S%H3244><s%>, and the swan <S%H8580><s%>,
And the pelican <S%H6893><s%>, and the gier eagle <S%H7360><s%>, and the cormorant <S%H7994><s%>,
And the stork <S%H2624><s%>, and the heron <S%H601><s%> after her kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the lapwing <S%H1744><s%>, and the bat <S%H5847><s%>.
And every creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that flies <S%H5775><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you <S%H398><s%>: they shall not be eaten.
But of all clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H5775><s%> you may eat <S%H398><s%>.

You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of any thing that dies of itself <S%H5038><s%>: you shall give <S%H5414><s%> it unto the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is in your gates <S%H8179><s%>, that he may eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H4376><s%>; or you may sell it unto an alien <S%H5237><s%>: for you are an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>. You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk <S%H2461><s%>.

You shall truly <S%H6237><s%> tithe <S%H6237><s%> all the increase <S%H8393><s%> of your seed <S%H2233><s%>, that the field <S%H7704><s%> brings forth <S%H3318><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year <S%H8141><s%>.

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H4643><s%>, the tithe of your corn <S%H1715><s%>, of your wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of your oil <S%H3323><s%>, and the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of your herds <S%H1241><s%> and of your flocks <S%H6629><s%>; that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>.

And if the way <S%H1870><s%> be too long <S%H7235><s%> for you <S%H3588><s%>, so that you are not able <S%H3201><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> it <S%H4725><s%>; or if the place be too far <S%H7368><s%> from you <S%H3068><s%>, which the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to set <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H3068><s%>, when the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed you <S%H1288><s%>:

Then shall you turn <S%H5414><s%> it into money <S%H3701><s%>, and bind up <S%H6696><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and shall go <S%H1980><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>:

And you shall bestow <S%H5414><s%> that money <S%H3701><s%> for whatever your soul <S%H5315><s%> lusts after <S%H183><s%>, for oxen <S%H1241><s%>, or for sheep <S%H6629><s%>, or for wine <S%H3196><s%>, or for strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, or for whatever your soul <S%H5315><s%> desires <S%H7592><s%>: and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> there before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, you <S%H1004><s%>, and your household,
And the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>; you shall not forsake <S%H5800><s%> him <S%H2506><s%>; for he has no part nor inheritance with you <S%H5159><s%>.

At the end <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> all the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your increase <S%H8393><s%> the same year <S%H8141><s%>, and shall lay it up <S%H3240><s%> inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>:

And the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, (because he has no part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you <S%H1616><s%>,) and the stranger, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, which are inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>, shall come <S%H935><s%>, and shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>; that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%> which you do <S%H6213><s%>.
